header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends

body.u: but luckily like it was kind of comfy there and it was cheap and like the toilet was good so it wasn't too bad
did you have air con?
yeah I did
course you did
yep
it wasn't so bad in Cambodia without it though was it?
no cos the fan was massive but in Battambang it was horrible
yeah
er but yeah I had air con in the dorm there and it was needed cos Chiang Mai was quite hot
yeah
and after I started taking the antibiotics like on the day after I was much better
did you do er that after I told you to cos I told you to take antibiotics didn't I
no
I recommended a few antibiotics to you and then the next thing I knew was that you'd been taking them
yeah I used I used your suggestions
yeah good stuff
and found that Ciprofloxacin
the Ciprofloxacin yeah
yes
I do that when I've had it for like four or five days now it's time to take some antibiotics
yeah
and usually within two or three days it clears up again
yeah within within the day it felt so much better like for the first time I woke up and didn't need to immediately shit
yeah just don't get into the habit of taking them every time you get sick you know cos it's there's not much you could do probably
yeah
but erm I'm glad you did cos you started talking about going to the doctors and I was thinking no no no you need to at least try a course of antibiotics on your own before you before you do that
mm
if that doesn't clear it up then go to the doctors
yeah but that sorted me out and then I I went zip lining
oh sweet
erm
was that fun?
yeah it was good I did a cooking course
it wasn't like that episode of South Park?
no
have you seen that one?
yes
little did they know that something or other is fun
erm I did a cooking course
so I'm not going to keep all this fat erm I'm gonna put a bit in here
yeah
sweet flavour
and I did like a two day tour where I saw the erm national park and like the temptemple on the hill
okay
so yeah of
you you did elephant something or other but it wasn't the same as what I was talking about was it it was like
yeah it was different have you seen this picture?
the one of you riding on its head?
no this one
oh the one that you got mum?
yeah
yeah I did see that
that was in Chiang Rai that was like a cultural
heritage place yeah
thing and there was a bunch of dancers like in front of me
this is a bit random
yeah er I enjoyed that
sounds good
yeah
I'm glad you had such a good time travelling
yeah I did I had a really good time and after that I
you can see why I've been doing it so much
yeah it's amazing
yeah
I'd kind of be I'd be willing to go on my own again definitely
yeah good
erm
just bear in mind that some places aren't quite as easy to travel
yeah
as those parts of the world but as you get more and more experience it will be easy
yeah er then I got the bus to Pai which wasn't that bad I'd heard horror stories about the little mini van
yeah
but it was
what from me or from other people?
just from other people like oh my god you nearly die they speed all the way there and the roads are really bumpy and people were being sick
I mean people are pansies sometimes
yeah the the s people on the bus had to take their sickness pills but I was alright
yeah
it was kind of just fun erm it was fine it was quite nice views going up there
and you motorbiked back from there didn't you?
yeah
which is pretty fun
oh did you see my hotel I got in Pai?
no
it was outrageous it was all pink
it was a Hello Kitty hotel
oh I think I did see that
yeah
I was like what?
it was a Hello Kitty hotel it was actually a nightmare
why?
staying there erm I only stayed there because like I was looking when I was in Chiang Mai
it's a bit of a random place to stay in Pai isn't it? it's not
yeah
I think I'll stay at the Hello Kitty hotel

when I was in Chiang Mai I was I er knew I was going to Pai the day after so I was looking through Agoda and like I saw this ridiculously pink hotel so I I was showed the er spanish girl and she was like oh my god you have to stay there so I was like oh I'm feeling completely crazy at the moment so I might as well
yeah
so I booked a couple of days there and I get there and oh my god it's all pink
like the whole building is pink
and inside is pink and the bed sheets are pink and you've got Hello Kitty bed sheets and alarm clock and but like the first room they gave me was it w stank of mould
oh no

yeah so I like went and complained and then obviously they don't speak very good English so I had trouble trying to actually converse with them and then they stuck me in some shitty other room where I went in and there was like a frog let me get this what are you trying to do? this one?
that yeah is it that one?
yeah you won't get that on
they stuck you in another room and there was a frog?
there was like a frog jumping around there were erm oh there were lots of bugs in there there were erm like worms coming out the drain
ugh
and the shower there was a a line of ants that went up the wall and went under the bed
it was pretty bad
so it was classic
yeah and there was tons of mosquitos as well and the door didn't properly close
and you had to use like erm a padlock erm er
your own padlock?
no a padlock they gave you but er it it the door would like hang out and then it was just a padlock kind of which obviously the mosquitos just came in
so easily
not good then
anyone outside would have just heard me like er ah
yeah
did you have the uhu
no I didn't have that
uhu
yeah
seeing the islands in the south part
Pai is nice though isn't it
yeah
I imagine it's changed quite a bit now from how it was
yeah
when I was there
but I wasn't happy with the room again cos it was shit and it was actually not that cheap
no
so I was like well I'm paying the proper rate here for a crappy room erm
so I went and complained again and I ended up having to phone up the manager and like arguing with him and saying look I want my money back I'm gonna write you a bad review
right
and eventually they gave me a better room and that one was okay
oh fortunate so complaining worked?
yeah
I normally don't complain I just leave find somewhere else
I felt like leaving but I was out of money
yeah
and my budget was spent and I was over budget already
through your own fault?
yeah
well you did choose to go to Hello Kitty hotel
yeah
surely the guy at the end was like why are you here?
yeah it was full of like Chinese guys but not like on their own they er just came as packs families and things like that so like no one would like talk to me
no

and like I'd I'd be getting picked up to go on like erm that elephant trek and erm like they they pull up outside the road in a in a a pickup truck with people just hanging out the back for you to get in and like everyone is just staring in awe at this pink hotel like I come strolling out with my shades
and I'm like er you can see them all looking at me and I don't know laughing I'm like you should see inside my room it's even better
yeah
so it was quite funny
so it was worth the experience
yeah
random why did it take you so long to get back to us? mum and I were a bit like
oh
I presume you were just busy or something weren't you
er what do you mean? when I was in Pai or Chiang Mai?
yeah you were sick in Chiang Mai and we didn't get a reply from you for ages and it like worried the crap out of mum and then
oh like I was just the same there wasn't any turn like I wasn't getting worse but I wasn't getting better
yeah
so I didn't really see any need to update
it's just cos you scared mum cos you'd send a really short message to say I'm still sick and that would be it so she's like oh my god is he alright? you know what I mean?
it's just sending such a shshort message yeah she does she worries less as long er when you go on longer
yeah but Pai was so cool I had rented a bike for like every day I was there
yeah
and I just went exploring on the scooter
that's nice as well
they give you a map now I don't know whether you had one of those
I don't think I did

there are so many like different places to go it pissed me off though when I got there that I rented the bike down the high street and like no one tells you where the petrol stations are so I'd assumed it was just like the south
mm
where any direction you go there'll be er little petrol pumps
yeah

to use and people sat on the roads on the side of the street no so like I pick a direction after I pick up the bike and I'm like okay the fuel tank's pretty low I need to find petrol so I'll go that way and I'm sure I'll find some no no petrol
nothing?
so I start to panic and I go another way and I'm like shit okay I can't find any so I head back
into town?
yeah and like the bike dies on the way
oh no
so I had to start fucking pushing the damn thing
how far?
and asking people like where the hell is the damn petrol?
how far did you have to push it?
oh probably about ten minutes not too bad
oh it wasn't too bad
no
yeah normally it just people with like coke bottles or something
yeah
keep going on the potato?
quicker otherwise some's gonna be boiled and some's not gonna be boiled
I'm really slow with potatoes
I haven't decided yet do you think it's better to cut these in half or to just have them standing up?
they look nice like that
you reckon?
yep
do you ever do stuffed peppers?
no never done them

you can do what my friend used to do you can't I haven't done it since cos we don't have it it's stuffed erm marrow and marrows are really big so like it's good you stuff it with loads of meat and potatoes and eggs and whatever
whatever you want yeah it's not too bad if you're feeding quite a few people
I'm sure you can have a stuffed sour gourd that'd be nice
that was horrible
it was
whatever that veg was I couldn't really eat it it grossed me out
sour marrow of some kind
I don't like bitter anyway it's a bit of a weird thing to give us
yes
I guess they just wanted us to try some of the local food
the problem is like some of these aren't gonna stand up like this one
after erm being in Thailand right I didn't find the Cambodian cuisine like amazingly interesting
no it's not no it's not so I mean the Philippines is really boring I think their food is terrible
mm
what baking pans do you have? what things can I put all these peppers in at the end?
okay

so is that big enough? oh there's two of them I'm tempted to cut the peppers in half so I can lay them down I can get one two peppers three peppers four and a half that'd be fine I think I'm gonna cut the peppers in half
oh we've got trapped quicker
you do know it's on lowest right?
yeah I'm talking about that
yeah you do know it's on its lowest
that's fine I'm not telling you to boil quicker I'm telling
oh
you to do it quicker
do I need to do any more after this one?
maybe
oh right
what do you think?
I don't really want to do any more
tough sous chef does want them so
we need a potato peeling machine
yeah it doesn't matter if you get a bit of skin on them it doesn't have to be perfect
I'm kind of tempted to get a rice cooker for in here
do you know what's better than that?
what?
is a knife
no I'm no quicker with a knife
oh mate where's a knife? where's like a small knife?
er I've tried it before I know better
where is a small knife?
in there
show me a good one there's gotta be a small knife here
no none of them are good
what's the name of the small that that's here
I don't think it's gonna fit any more in there
you could
maybe one
if you can get it like this you know kind of picking it round
god that's so much quicker
it is isn't it
but I can't do that
why can't you do it?
you're losing a lot
yeah that's right
I'm I'm rushing it but if you do it quicker and you get better at it you lose less potato do you want to give it another try?
no I'm alright I'm done with potatoes
oh you're done with them
yeah
I see give up so you're not gonna have cheese is that what you've decided?
yeah no cheese by the time I finish this I'm gonna have to start cooking so I can eat so that I can go to kickboxing
this is bullshit
well you could just eat this now you could eat yours now
that's probably good
yeah we can just put yours in the oven yeah?
yeah
and then and I will eat ours later
yeah
yeah I did take big chunks off but it's not exactly like you were you weren't doing the same with the peeler
you can't take massive chunks off with the peeler
you were taking some pretty big chunks off
oh maybe
I mean look at that you did that
ah what one? no that one's yours
whatever all these bits chunky chunk that's yours
well I don't think it is cos it doesn't fit through the peeler so how did I do that? it's yours
yeah do you just want to eat this then before you go?
that'd be good do you reckon that's enough potato?
mm don't know we're three grown men I can't believe you've been using the peeler I hate those peelers
oh well I should really learn to use a knife
yeah you get better at it I'm not always terrible like sometimes you can go just below the skin but I rushed that one
mm
and to be honest I haven't peeled a potato before you've gotta just hold it with your thumb like that and hold the knife in front of you
yeah just practice I guess
where are you off to? do you wanna clean up a bit and then we're done pretty much
where are the nice apples?
in the fridge you say nice apples but I didn't get a nice one
I think this one's nice
I'll put that back
that bit goes on here doesn't it?
yeah and erm just clean up and then we're done
